post.body: Cool! You can't miss that guy!
can't wait to read it
Really? Even tho they snatched MT away from the Sox?
Happy Holidays, Mark. Stay inside!!
Crazy. Is the inside of a mall not a public space?
ha, prob more of a turfwar in boston media mkt. Gatehouse and it's predecessors have always had dibs on the community news there
Seems the opposite of what you'd want to do if you're creating content on the Web -- um, don't you want to get MORE eyeballs?
Megabus? There's one I've never heard of...
You might not be! I might be wrong, but most places could cancel the old one and reissue if it hasn't been spent yet... I think...
Thanks, Kathy. Hope you have a great holiday!
G'night everyone. Y'all are the best! Happy Holidays! :-)
No spoilers to @tylerbreed abt the top chef special tonight please! dvr was messed up and couldn't watch it! hopefully on replay sometime...
Getting ready for Reed family Christmas Eve tradition -- cheese fondue!
Apparently making a snow angel warrants a $10,000 fine... http://bit.ly/S06m
a MUST READ post by @arvind. He was escorted out of a mall yesterday after taking photos of his family. http://bit.ly/Bp0k
Disconnecting for a while -- flight to catch, then hangin' w/ fam. Peace!
On Our Minds co-blogger Jen just posted this! http://bit.ly/UScz Post a comment on First Book blog and books go to kids in need!

checkig my flight status on my computer bc I'm too lazy to walk two gates down to see for myself...
